author: Bellular News
description:
Bungie's CEO walked away three years and one month after the Sony acquisition—exactly when stock options mature. Ex-staff aren't holding back their fury, and PlayStation is taking direct control.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 Bungie's Long Summer
00:36 It Got Worse!
02:59 Bungie's CEO Walked
06:06 They've Been Folded Into PlayStation
08:36 Broken Down. Can They Rebuild?
10:53 Alternative Options
12:30 Bungie's Potential Future

Sources:

title: The Leaks Were True: Bungie's CEO Cuts And Runs
